EmailTemplate.name: McDonalds Extra Value Deal
EmailTemplate.subject: Extra Value Deal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OfficeDepot and McDonalds
Save up to 45% on HP® toner! As a McDonald’s owner operator, we know how important it is for you to save. We’ve partnered to bring you the best value on toner. Take advantage today and save up to $2,000 per store annually by purchasing HP toner through the Office Depot® program. With your HP JetIntelligence printers, there is a bundle of printing technology features:
•
Superior quality and efficiency from using HP toner with HP printers
•
Page maximizer
•
Print gauge technology
•
More performance and protection
•
Cartridges can be used with multiple models including HP 131A , 507A, 55X, 80X and 305A/X.
The right products. The right prices. The right people. That’s our recipe for success.
Contact your dedicated Account Manager today:
Timothy Lebar 855.337.6811 Ext. 16524 timothy.lebar@officedepot.com
Gabriel Escobar 855.337.6811 Ext. 12692 gabriel.escobar@officedepot.com
